get.description: Lists available operations for the Microsoft.Kusto provider.

parameters.description: Client API Version.
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the list of available operations.

nextLink.title: The URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

description.title: The friendly name of the operation.

provider.title: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.title: The resource type on which the operation is performed.

display.title: The object that describes the operation.

origin.title: The intended executor of the operation.

value.title: The list of operations supported by the resource provider.

schema.title: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
